title: Career Exploration and Goal Setting
description: This chapter focuses on career exploration processes and establishing professional development goals.
learning_objectives: Understand the difference between a job and a career
Identify personal interests, skills, and values for career exploration
Research career paths using appropriate resources
Develop SMART career goals for short-term and long-term planning
Create a personalized career development plan

skill_builder.title: Career Path Planner
skill_builder.description: Interactive tool for developing a comprehensive career path plan with short-term, mid-term, and long-term goals.
